title: Stream: THEESatisfaction – awE naturalE
body:
So far we’re heard 2 snippets from the debut full length from **[THEESatisfaction](https://www.facebook.com/pages/THEEsatisfaction/130540100350873)**, the **[Shabazz Palaces](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/12960-video-shabazz-palaces-black-up/ "Video: Shabazz Palaces – Black Up")** collaborators who’ve been harbouring a fair amount of buzz recently. Ahead of the LP’s March 27th release date, Sub Pop has graciously put the album up for streaming. OMG THNX SUBPOP.

Pre-order the record [here](http://www.amazon.com/awE-naturalE-THEESatisfaction/dp/B0073US9N0%3FSubscriptionId%3DAKIAJNA3QS2AGVCXHCCA%26tag%3Dnpr-5-20%26linkCode%3Dxm2%26camp%3D2025%26creative%3D165953%26creativeASIN%3DB0073US9N0) and stream the whole thing below.

Ahead of the LP’s March 27th release date, Sub Pop has graciously put the album up for streaming. OMG THNX SUBPOP. Pre-order the record here and stream the whole thing \[…\]
